item.title: Crystal Palace Parade SE19 at Anerley Hill junction, 3rd July
item.description:

item.title: Trip hazard to members of public. Paving stone loose and wobbly with concrete post about to fall over at some point. I fell over and hurt myself.I was walking home past the concrete post and slab in the area and tripped and fell.There is no accommodation for excess for lack of maintenance and I will be taking legal action if this is not dealt with., 3rd July

item.title: Broken glass on road outside 22-26 Westcombe Park Road, 3rd July
item.description:
Some beer bottles have been smashed in the road outside 22, 24 and 26 Westcombe Park Road. We have tried to clear up the worst but it is still a hazard to cars and any pedestrians crossing there. This happened evening of 3July.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Westcombe Park Road, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Pavement, 92 Glengall Road., 3rd July
item.description:
The lady at this address has been dumping household items and waste into the street. Neighbors have disposed of some items but she continues to throw rubbish on the pavement. Please assist as this is now a daily occurrence.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glengall Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Croxted Road SE24 a few yards south of Hawarden, 3rd July
item.description:
Croxted Road SE24 a few yards south of Hawarden Grove junction / at the side of house number 1 Hawarden Grove gutter grate 100% blocked on Croxted Road. Grate is on double yellow lines so access should be okay. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4485246,-0.0984746,3a,18.4y,273.52h,80.2t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sPwz8FZdsXkn0BnWkv5HqsQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D9.80395897467045%26panoid%3DPwz8FZdsXkn0BnWkv5HqsQ%26yaw%3D273.52040593275!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYzMC4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
